response_parsed.title: Refactoring ETL Jobs Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to modernize Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) jobs by integrating them with FastAPI, a high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Adopting a microservice architecture for ETL tasks
Utilizing FastAPI's routing features to create endpoints for ETL jobs
Implementing asynchronous processing with FastAPI's built-in support for asyncio
Using dependency injection for modular and testable code
Leveraging type hints and Pydantic models for better code organization and validation
